item.description:
Energize Your Life through Meditation - Is it a science or an art?

We will discuss briefly :

The forms of meditation - science and art - and their differences

The benefits of meditation:

Release your holiday stress, financial worries, family/work pressure

Meditation can help you work smarter and be more productive. You can aquire better human faculties by unfolding five of the seven intelligences:

Instinctive Intelligence
Emotional Intelligence
Concrete mental intelligence
Abstract intelligence
Psychic intelligence
Spiritual intelligence
Divine intelligence

This webinar will help you to see the benefits of meditation and which types you may want to explore further for your own personal development.

You don't need a large amount of time to have an effective meditation. Even 15 minutes can release a large amount of stress - we will practice this at the end of the webinar.

Have a great weekend and I look forward to speaking with you on Tuesday!

Melissa Gurry
Family Solutions Specialist
item.name: How to Energize Your Life - FREE Webinar
